attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: This app encourages Trump Supporters to spend money to receive points and then trade in those “points” for merchandise and pictures with the President. The Trump campaign has continued to try and use its supporters like some kind of scam, and this app is a continuation of that.

attributes.title: DO NOT BUY
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it has asked me for all my info and instead of my beloved president on the page it showed a Cheeto puff. I’m so sorry but this app is not good and it gave me glitches as soon as I logged in

attributes.title: RUSSIA!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was genuinely curious of what or great 🍊 Orange 🍊 was doing but when I opened the app the screen just kept blinking RUSSIAN  SPY!! in red I didn’t know what to do so I clicked yes and it stole all my information I think it sent it to Russia help.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app has taken over my phone and got into all of my personal information just like a hacker or computer virus. Had to delete it.

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app has made my phone terribly slow since i’ve downloaded it, and the app itself is glitchy if I could rate this a zero I could. 😾

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: This app is very hard to use it crashes my phone and when trying to go back to it, it freezes my phone. 1 star❤️

attributes.title: Physical Pain when Using
attributes.review: This app is so horrible!! When I opened it, I was welcomed by a troll bridge with no way to pass 😾😾 After I used it for 5 minutes I had to DELETE because I started to get a migraine🥱🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: say bye bye to your app trump:)
attributes.review: to trump you disgusting homophobic,racist,animal killer ,disabled mocker, sexual abuser, and police brutality influencer just wanted to say that everything you’ve done is horrible:) you’re a president not a comedian.I hope your app burns along with you :)

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: This app is equivalent to trash. When I downloaded the app it started spamming my phone and it wouldn’t stop. I undownloaded the app then redowloaded it. AND IT STILL KEPT ON SPAMMING MY PHONE, I couldn’t even open the app. So I deleted it. Take down the app it is so bad.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app took several days to download on my phone and then once it finished downloading it kept crashing. I would not recommend downloading this app
